item.description:
Description from the website:
Twelve miles of trails at Wachusett Meadow traverse vast meadows, woodlands, and wetlands. Brown Hill Summit, South Wachusett Brook, and Glacial Boulder are highlights among many other features. Wildlife is abundant in all seasons, and visitors may take advantage of opportunities to snowshoe, cross-country ski, and canoe in addition to hiking.

Address:
113 Goodnow Road
Princeton, MA 01541
978-464-2712
wachusett@massaudubon.org

More information and directions:

http://www.massaudubon.org/Nature_Connection/Sanctuaries/Wachusett_Meadow/index.php

We’ll begin our journey at the main parking lot at 11am for a brief introduction.

From the lot we will get our first sample of what the meadows have in store as we walk a brief section of the South Meadow Trail to view the Beaver Wetland, then we'll connect on to the Beaver Bend Trail, taking us to the Pasture Trail, to the Heron Rookery Trail where I’m hoping we’ll see Great Blue Herons nesting. 

We’ll then head back towards the Visitor Center and take the North Meadow Trail (behind the Visitor Center). We’ll head up the Glacial Boulder trail, then Brown Hill Loop, leading to the summit (elev. 1312’). After breaking at the summit for viewing/pictures/snacks, we’ll descend the loop trail, pass Otter Pond, the Giant White Oak, the Farm Pond, and grazing sheep! The hike shouldn't take more than 1.5 - 2 hours with breaks for viewing/pics along the way. 

Trail Map

Please be prepared for early summer temps, bugs and sun! Wear sturdy hiking boots, and bring bug repellent, sunscreen, hat, water (and/or gator-ade), snacks/lunch and a camera.

The Visitor Center across from the parking lot has Restrooms, daily logs of wildlife sightings, trail maps and a nature center.

There is a $4 fee to non-members and non-residents of Princeton, payable at the Visitor Center. The day before the hike I'll send out an email with my cell#. Please update your RSVP if your plans change.

The hike is weather permitting.

I hope you can join us!

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Explore Wachusett Meadow-Father's Day Hike
